title: Do you find Ekko Cancerous?
body: I'm not going on a rant or anything and i'm just curious on what you guys have to say about Ekko as a champion. In my opinion, Ekko is really cancerous, he can build full tank and have 42 ap and still demolish anyone in a 1 v 1. I was in a game against a Ekko top and he had only 42 ap, he ulted back and  hit our adc which her healthbar went straight away half. He can dive people and get away without a scratch because he does so much for a tank.

replies.body:
Any champ becomes cancerous if they are played a lot, because people just are sick to death of playing against them.

But yes, Ekko is approaching Yasuo's level of terminal cancer.

All I have to say is yes.

As much as i fucking hate the term "cancerous" yes... He has way too muck going on with his kit. I dunno what they could do to make him less of an asshat. Possibly reduse the bonus ms he gets would be a good start?

As someone who plays a lot of tank and ap ekko, he is cancer as fuck, there is very little you can do against him.

The only thing you can do in lane is trade with him when he E>Q's you, but he gets his escape move speed going, and he makes the trade end.

A good ekko has no real counterplay outside of his tiny as fuck cooldowns.
He Eq's you and can run like a lil bitch which outrades you, also even though his dead, his q still deals damage.

Nah. Just watch your positioning and his harmless. I Vs'd one today in mid as an ADC. Destroyed him just using really good positioning and poking him constantly. Sure it is easier with ADC but still works with most champions. 

Also you can see his ult coming, i mean its telegraphed like mad, anyone with half a brain can avoid his ult =/.

Nothing haha, just like posting in here hahaha

It felt like Riot's efforts to contain tank Ekko worked at first, those nerfs hit nearly everything and we started to see an identical tank Fizz, but the Trinity Force changes threw him right back into the mix. Just watching him split push with near immunity in Pro play, depending on the match up of course, makes me think that it will be incredibly difficult to balance him. I'd go so far as to say that Ekko might be the new Kassadin.
Yes, still is since his release.

As an Ekko main I'm kind of in the middle with tank Ekko.

Every time I play against it he just seems to be unkillable, but whenever I play him tank I feed and just don't get how it works.

I think that's just me though. I prefer high damage champs,
hahaha watch tank late game ekko, dude does more than a full ap fizz LOL
